name: Mappings
description: The Mappings class is an advanced utility in JSMacros that provides comprehensive support for handling Minecraft obfuscation mappings and reflection operations.

constructors.description: Creates a new Mappings instance with the specified mapping source.

parameters.name: mappingsource
parameters.description: Path or URL to the mapping file (.tiny) or Yarn mappings JAR

methods.name: getMappings
methods.description: Retrieves the forward mappings (Intermediary -> Named). Throws IOException if the mapping source is malformed or cannot be accessed.

methods.name: getReversedMappings
methods.description: Retrieves the reverse mappings (Named -> Intermediary). Throws IOException if the mapping source is malformed or cannot be accessed.

methods.name: remapClass
methods.description: Creates a MappedClass wrapper for an object instance that uses mappings for reflection operations. Throws IOException if mappings cannot be loaded.

parameters.name: instance
parameters.description: The object instance to wrap with mapping support

methods.name: getClass
methods.description: Gets a MappedClass for a class name without requiring an instance (for accessing static members). Throws IOException or ClassNotFoundException.

parameters.name: className
parameters.description: The class name (can be either named or intermediary format)
